title: Add 5-second long-press Home banner trigger for Hidden Admin Mode passcode modal

requirements.text: Implement an additional Hidden Admin Mode activation method: a press-and-hold (long-press) gesture on the Home channel banner image area that, after a continuous 5 seconds, opens the existing Admin passcode modal (the same modal used by the Ctrl+Shift+U shortcut) so the admin can enter the existing passcode and enable Admin Mode. This long-press trigger must work on both mobile (touch) and desktop (mouse/pointer), must not replace or modify the existing Ctrl+Shift+U shortcut behavior, and must not interfere with normal song playback/navigation interactions elsewhere on the Home screen.

acceptanceCriteria: On mobile, pressing and holding on the Home banner image continuously for 5 seconds opens the existing Admin passcode modal (no navigation).
On desktop, clicking and holding on the Home banner image continuously for 5 seconds opens the existing Admin passcode modal (no navigation).
Releasing early, moving pointer/finger off the banner, or canceling the gesture prevents the modal from opening.
The existing Ctrl+Shift+U shortcut continues to open the same Admin passcode modal exactly as before.
The passcode flow remains unchanged: the modal still accepts the same passcode and enables/disables Admin Mode using the existing Hidden Admin Mode logic.
No new admin-only UI controls become visible unless Admin Mode is enabled; the long-press only opens the passcode modal.

constraints: Do not edit any frontend files under the immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose and integrate via non-immutable components/hooks only).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
Do not change the existing Ctrl+Shift+U Hidden Admin Mode activation flow; add long-press as an additional trigger only.
Do not change the admin passcode value or modal copy/labels beyond what is necessary to wire in the new trigger.
nonGoals: Replacing the Ctrl+Shift+U shortcut with long-press.
Changing the passcode or introducing a new admin credential scheme.
Adding new admin UI features beyond opening the existing passcode modal from a long-press gesture.
Backend changes or state migrations for this request.
